fulltext:
CONTACT INFORMATION 
Full Name: Nguyen Hong Dung 
Date of Birth: 06/01/1992 
Gender: Male 
Contact number: 0903078491 
Email: dung.nhd61@gmail.com 
Address: 322/17A Minh Phung street, Ward 2, District 6, HCM City 
APPLICATION OBJECTIVE 
To obtain a position as an outstanding employee which offers a professional working environment 
and enables me as a Business Analyst to grow, and devote my best while meeting the 
corporation’s goals. 
Expected income: Above 1000 USD net per month. 
CAREER OBJECTIVE 
Short Term: 
Long Term 
 
Be a professional consultant. 
 
Get IELTS 7.0  for 2 years. 
 
Be a principal BA for 5 years 
 
Working abroad  
EDUCATION 
Oct 2013-Oct 2014 
Bachelor ’s degree in Finance and Banking (degree is 
completed fully in English), University of Sunderland 
Oct 2010-Oct 2013 
BTEC Higher National Diploma of Edexcel Centre 
WORK EXPERIENCE 
Years as IT Business Analyst  
Year as Salesforce Functional Consultant 
Year as Concept Assurance in Retail Industry 
CURRICULUM VITAE 
Aug 2018 - Now 
IT Business Analyst at NashTech Global: 
Responsibility 
 
Working indirectly with customer to get the business 
requirements; then transmit accordingly to Offshore developer 
team. 
 
Creating Business Requirement Spec, SRS (System Requirement 
Spec), UC list and UC detail and User Stories 
 
Assistting PM on requirement sign off process and project change 
requests 
 
Supportting UAT in testing, verifying bugs/issues with client 
 Assisting Bid Manager in pre-sales support activities 
especially on analysis phases 
 
Working as a BA in several projects in NashTech from Aug 
2018 – Now in domains as: Mobile, Education, Fitness CRM. 
Aug 2017 - Aug 2018 
Salesforce Functional Consultant at Sun Viet Technologies JSC: 
Responsibility 
 
Worked indirectly with customer to get the business requirements; 
then design Salesforce solution as developer. 
 
Document the client’s business requirements in detail, 
(requirement specifications) 
 
Developed Force.com developer toolkit and custom code using 
the Salesforce.com (Junior Level)  
 
Tested, defined bug and resolve for issue during the releasing 
product 
 
Trained & supportted users 
 
Worked as a functional consultant/ developer in Patient 
Management Project with Sanofi from December 2017 - April 
2017 
Aug 2016 - Aug 2017 
IT Business Analyst/Tester in FPT Software - Global Enterprises 
Service: 
Responsibility 
 
Worked directly with customer to get the business requirements; 
then transmit accordingly to developer team. 
 
Document the client’s business requirements in detail, 
(requirement specifications) 
 
Analysed business requirement and configured the Microsoft 
Dynamics CRM to satisfy business requirements 
 
Tested and defined bug for issue during the releasing product 
 
Trained & supportted users 
 
Worked as a business analyst requirement / tester in 
Electronic Medical Record of National Kidney Foundation of 
Singapore 
Aug 2015 - Aug 2016 
Concept Assurance at Saigon Co.op 
Responsibility: 
 
Opened new food stores and convenient stores. 
 
Set the layout and arrange the products in a stores. 
 
Analysed the segmentation of products 
 
Made the revenue reports for company. 
 
Tested the concept marketing of the stores. 
Aug 2014-Apr 2015 
Internship for BIDC, HCM city 
Responsibility: Analyzing financial report 
SKILLS 
Computer skill 
 Advanced computer skill in Microsoft Offices 
 Intermediate level of skill in   
 Good at. 
Language skill 
 
Excellent verbal and written skills in English. 
 
Completed Tyndale English certificate level 4 which is equivalent to IELTS 6.5. 
Soft Skill 
Powered by TCPDF (www.tcpdf.org)
